text: Aburamu akĩrehera Jehova indo icio ciothe, agĩciatũrania njatũ igĩrĩ, na agĩciara mũhari, o rwatũ rũkaringana na rwatũ rũrĩa rũngĩ; no nyoni-rĩ, aaciũraga ndaaciatũranirie.15:10 Kĩrĩkanĩro o gĩothe kĩarĩkia kũiguithanĩrio nĩ kwarutagwo igongona rĩa nyamũ ĩrĩa yatinanagio maita meerĩ, nao arĩa maathondekaga kĩrĩkanĩro kĩu makagera gatagatĩ ga icunjĩ icio cierĩ.
